Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap

Enum StatusItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<StatusItem>
      • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.StatusItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<StatusItem>
    public enum StatusItem
extends java.lang.Enum<StatusItem>
    Status data items that can be requested in an IMAP STATUS command.

    These correspond to the status data items defined in RFC 9051 Section 6.3.11.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    RFC 9051 Section 6.3.11

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      APPENDLIMIT
      The mailbox append limit in octets.
      DELETED
      The number of messages with the \Deleted flag set.
      HIGHESTMODSEQ
      The highest mod-sequence value of all messages in the mailbox.
      MESSAGES
      The number of messages in the mailbox.
      RECENT
      The number of messages with the \Recent flag set.
      SIZE
      The total size of the mailbox in octets.
      UIDNEXT
      The next unique identifier value of the mailbox.
      UIDVALIDITY
      The unique identifier validity value of the mailbox.
      UNSEEN
      The number of messages which do not have the \Seen flag set.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • MESSAGES

        public static final StatusItem MESSAGES
        The number of messages in the mailbox.

      • RECENT

        public static final StatusItem RECENT
        The number of messages with the \Recent flag set.

        Note: This is deprecated in IMAP4rev2 but still supported for backward compatibility.

      • UIDNEXT

        public static final StatusItem UIDNEXT
        The next unique identifier value of the mailbox.

      • UIDVALIDITY

        public static final StatusItem UIDVALIDITY
        The unique identifier validity value of the mailbox.

      • UNSEEN

        public static final StatusItem UNSEEN
        The number of messages which do not have the \Seen flag set.

      • DELETED

        public static final StatusItem DELETED
        The number of messages with the \Deleted flag set.

        This is an IMAP4rev2 extension.

      • SIZE

        public static final StatusItem SIZE
        The total size of the mailbox in octets.

        This is an IMAP4rev2 extension.

      • HIGHESTMODSEQ

        public static final StatusItem HIGHESTMODSEQ
        The highest mod-sequence value of all messages in the mailbox.

        Requires CONDSTORE extension (RFC 7162).

      • APPENDLIMIT

        public static final StatusItem APPENDLIMIT
        The mailbox append limit in octets.

        Requires APPENDLIMIT extension (RFC 7889).

      • getImapName

        public java.lang.String getImapName()
        Returns the IMAP protocol name for this status item.
        Returns:
        the IMAP name (e.g., "MESSAGES", "UIDNEXT")

      • fromImapName

        public static StatusItem fromImapName​(java.lang.String name)
        Parses an IMAP status item name to the corresponding enum value.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
